positions.description: # Led 12 member water sustainability team where the role included but was not limited to operating a 6000 kLD water treatment facility without any quality failures in HCCBPL, Goblej - the largest unit of Coca-Cola in India.*Worked in Process Area ( syrup manufacture & CIP) coordinating between Maintainence Team & Process Team for mitigation of identified abnormalities * Improved tracking of sugar yield and concentrate yield making run size wise , pack size wise, flavour wise , line wise & flavour wise tracking possible  * Worked with team as well as OEM towards identification of programming bugs in CIP program resulting in delays and suggested programming improvements not only aimed at time improvement but also mitigation of food safety risks * Worked in conjunction with production team for improvement of CIP time compliance by reducing CIP time on PET CSD line by 10 minutes through identification of opportunities & CAPA implementation* Worked in Water Treatment Plant coordinating between Maintainence Team and WTP team for mitigation of pending and identified abnormalities* Worked with team to implement design changes aimed at mitigating food safety risks *Worked with management and team towards improvement plan to overcome water deficit due to variability of source turbidity & TOC* Established SOPs as well as frequencies for proper backwashing and oversaw proper implementation of the same for efficient performance of PSFs and ACFs in turbidity reduction * Worked on and successfully secured legal and corporate approval for new source water meeting QSE requirements.* Optimised water usage from multiple sources through multiple streams to mitigate deficit while maintaining water quality parameters within specifications for supply to line.
positions.title: Team Leader- Quality Assurance
positions.description_html:
# Led 12 member water sustainability team where the role included but was not limited to operating a 6000 kLD water treatment facility without any quality failures in HCCBPL, Goblej - the largest unit of Coca-Cola in India.

*Worked in Process Area ( syrup manufacture & CIP) coordinating between Maintainence Team & Process Team for mitigation of identified abnormalities
* Improved tracking of sugar yield and concentrate yield making run size wise , pack size wise, flavour wise , line wise & flavour wise tracking possible
* Worked with team as well as OEM towards identification of programming bugs in CIP program resulting in delays and suggested programming improvements not only aimed at time improvement but also mitigation of food safety risks
* Worked in conjunction with production team for improvement of CIP time compliance by reducing CIP time on PET CSD line by 10 minutes through identification of opportunities & CAPA implementation
* Worked in Water Treatment Plant coordinating between Maintainence Team and WTP team for mitigation of pending and identified abnormalities
* Worked with team to implement design changes aimed at mitigating food safety risks
*Worked with management and team towards improvement plan to overcome water deficit due to variability of source turbidity & TOC
* Established SOPs as well as frequencies for proper backwashing and oversaw proper implementation of the same for efficient performance of PSFs and ACFs in turbidity reduction
* Worked on and successfully secured legal and corporate approval for new source water meeting QSE requirements.
* Optimised water usage from multiple sources through multiple streams to mitigate deficit while maintaining water quality parameters within specifications for supply to line.
